snippet: The U.N. mediator at Syria peace talks in Geneva has handed all the delegations a paper with 12 principles that would be the basis for a second round of negotiations, said the head of the "Moscow Platform" political grouping at the talks....

headline.main: Women’s Fashion Shows: Rick Owens, Chloé, Balmain

lead_paragraph: The U.N. mediator at Syria peace talks in Geneva has handed all the delegations a paper with 12 principles that would be the basis for a second round of negotiations, said the head of the "Moscow Platform" political grouping at the talks.
